```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(purrr)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
source(here("R", "exponential_growth.R"))

exponential_growth(init_pop = 100, r = 10, t = 5)

r <- seq(from= 0, to = 1, by=0.01)

t <- seq(from= 1, to=1000, by=5)

population_data <- data.frame(matrix(nrow= length(r), ncol=length(t)))

colnames(population_data) <- t

rownames(population_data) <- r

for(i in 1:length(r)) {
  for(j in 1:length(t)) {
    population_data[i,j] = exponential_growth(init_pop=100, r = r[i], t=t[j])
  }
}

population_data$r = rownames(population_data)

population_data <- population_data %>% 
  pivot_longer(!r, names_to=c("time", "growth_rate"), values_to= "population_size")
```
